answers.answer: You go through different stages of your pregnancy. .. if this is your first one you really dont know what to expect when it comes to your hormones and your emotions... I experienced a bout of depression after being told I have gestational diabetes and everything that I wanted to eat I couldnt... it was hard for me... but I finally came to terms with it and I'm no longer depressed. .. it is something that I just have to work with my doctor to control for another few more weeks...

Yes. It's very common. Best thing to do is talk to your Dr about it. And honestly just talking to people helps a lot!!! Friends family anyone who can help you thru it that you trust. I went thru it during my first trimester. Also getting out in the nice weather helps combat it. Do something nice for yourself and anything that is stressing you walk away from it.
I'm 36 weeks pregnant! Just woke up this morning & was having a bad day! Started crying & saying "I don't wanna be a mom!" :P I feel much better now! Your definitely not alone!

I'm 17 weeks and just found out we're having a girl. Usually that is happy news but I am now on hour 5 of a severe anxiety attack.  You are definitely not alone. I have had thoughts of I don't know if I want to be a mom and i am terrified i am going to get post partum but it eventually goes away either by distraction, talking it out, medications (my ob prescribed me vistaril for the panic attacks) or just giving it time. Hang in there; call your doc if it gets serious.
Omg yes I hv great days and bad I get sad because I lost my sexy im thicker and im not party women no more I kno hubby misses that but I cant be around smoke or craziness but its normal hun...gd luck

I did all the time at first now its just fear I don't understand why since I have other kids but me and the father no longer get along and it bothers I just keep thinking its hormones and it will pass

question: I am 24 weeks now and im so depressed i cry all the time and its all to do with my pregnancy. Does anyone els feel like giving up on everything at this point and when do you start feeling beter
title: does everyone get depressed
